name: 30SecondDeceptionTipsBySpencerCoffman
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Each day you'll listen to a new deception tip in 30-seconds or less. Each tip will introduce you to a new sign of deception. Use them to help you understand body language and spot lies. Of course, these 30-second tips are only the beginning! Be sure to expand your people reading skills by seeking out the other great information Spencer Coffman has available.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
